text: Escape the Fate is an American post-hardcore band from Las Vegas, Nevada. The band was formed in 2004, in 2005 they won a radio competition to open for My Chemical Romance which led to a signing to Epitaph Records. In the year 2006 the band released debut album, Dying Is Your Latest Fashion. With the new frontman Craig Mabbitt (Former Blessthefall vocalist) the band released the album This War Is Ours in October 2008. In 2010, the band released the third album, Escape The Fate, in November. The lead vocalist Ronnie Radke left the band in 2008 due to legal issues. Radke left the jail in December 2010 and is currently a vocalist in the post-hardcore band Falling in Reverse. In 2012, founding member Max Green was kicked out due to drug abuse and missing shows and he was permanently replaced by Thomas "TJ" Bell, formerly of Motionless In White and Micheal Money, brother of Bryan "Monte" Money was introduced as official rythmn guitarist. ==Band members== ===Current members=== * Craig Mabbitt (2008 - present) lead vocals * Robert Ortiz (2004 - present) - drums, percussions, backing vocals * Thomas "TJ" Bell (2012 - present)- rhythm guitar, bass, backing vocals * Kevin "Thrasher" Gruft (2013 - present) - lead guitar ===Touring members=== * Kevin Thrasher (2011-Filling In For Monte's On The Uproar Tour) ===Former members=== * Omar Espinosa (2004 - 2007) \- rhythm guitar, backing vocals * Carson Allen (2005 - 2006) - vocals, synthesizers * Ronnie Radke (2004 - 2006 ;
